name: Phantasm
description:
Episode 1

Phantasm is an atmospheric adventure game that allows the player to traverse between memories using a system called Observe OS.

Follow the story of Jason, a memory observer at Williamson Cognitive Research Center who accidentally discovered access to a hidden network of memories. Traversing between them and observing each unique story, some forbidden reminiscence and truth began to surface. As Jason realizes that those people are familiar, he must decide to investigate more.

Key Features:

  • Beautifully crafted atmosphere.
  • Access to a virtual operating system.
  • Traverse between different memories, each a story on its own.
  • Lofi soundtrack.
